name: 1D GOLF
description:
One-dimensional golf-like game that uses calculation and senses!
Each character has special ability! 
Unlock hidden characters and course editor!

Original Japanese version was  developed in 2004. 

■Play time
10 to 30 minutes per play.

■1D GOLF  WORLD ONLINE CHAMPIONSHIP
Pseudo online battles are held on an irregular basis!
Come and join our Discord server for more details. 

▼Discord
https://discord.gg/thS4CRH
